title: Part A
stimulusHtml: One point for one cause, from 1450−1500, that contributed to the geographical distribution of printing centers in Europe.
descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

One point for one cause, from 1450−1500, that contributed to the geographical distribution of printing centers in Europe.

The student response earns one of the following points:

One point for one cause, from 1450−1500, that contributed to the geographical distribution of printing centers in Europe.

title: Part B
stimulusHtml: One point for one short-term cultural OR political effect, from 1500−1550, of the emergence of printing centers
descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

One point for one short-term cultural OR political effect, from 1500−1550, of the emergence of printing centers

The student response earns one of the following points:

One point for one short-term cultural OR political effect, from 1500−1550, of the emergence of printing centers

title: Part C
stimulusHtml: One point for one long-term effect, from 1550−1789, of the spread of printing on European society.
descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

One point for one long-term effect, from 1550−1789, of the spread of printing on European society.

The student response earns one of the following points:

One point for one long-term effect, from 1550−1789, of the spread of printing on European society.
